description: A key that can unlock the seastone handcuffs restraining Portgas D. Ace on the execution platform. Hancock obtained this key through unknown means and gave it to Luffy.
significance: Critical tool for Luffy's plan to rescue Ace, as it would allow him to free Ace from the restraints once he reaches the execution platform.

description: A jitte with a seastone tip that can nullify Devil Fruit powers. This weapon was broken by Hancock's Perfume Femur kick in Episode 469.
significance: One of Smoker's primary weapons for fighting Devil Fruit users. Its destruction removes a key advantage Smoker had against such opponents.
